* Mike Borger - Mayor

Mike Borger - Mayor
===================

|  |
| --- |
| DSC_3076 |

ABOUT 

Mike was elected Mayor of Pampa in June 2025.

Although a distant relative of the founder of Borger, Texas, Mike never lived there but was born and raised in Amarillo. He and his wife Lynnae moved to Pampa in 2015 when he became the Pastor of Trinity Fellowship Church Pampa.

Mike enjoys preaching, writing songs, and performing with his long-time band, The Prairie Dogs.

  
ACCOMPLISHMENTS

After high school, Mike attended Harding University and earned a B.S. Degree in Finance with honors. He raised capital and started Turn-Key Leasing, an equipment leasing business and Prairie Investment Corporation, which has been primarily involved in residential real estate.

He has been an investor and also served as a Director on both public and private company boards. His board appointments have included Audit Committee Chairman and Board Chairman.

  
FAMILYMike and Lynnae have three children and eight grandchildren. Their daughter Lacey is a licensed Speech Language Pathologist. Their son Tanner is an Investment Banker and their youngest son Chance is a Mechanical Engineer.  
  
VISIONMy vision is for Pampa to become a city known for cutting edge industries where many careers are available. I want Pampa to be known for great schools, strong churches, new neighborhoods, and well maintained quality of life assets. Pampa will be a place people are proud to call home.  
  
Contact Information**tel:** (806) 669-5750  
**email:**

Pampa, TX 79065
